session.workspace.rmi
Class BlockingWorkspaceDriver

java.lang.Object
  session.workspace.WorkspaceDriver
      session.workspace.rmi.BlockingWorkspaceDriver

public class BlockingWorkspaceDriver
extends WorkspaceDriver

A Workspace Driver that implements blocking method invocations as the model of computation. In a blocking method invocation, the component invoking the method remains blocked until the remote method returns. Upon completion, the result of the blocking method invocation is available to the invoker.

Author:
Rica| rdo Corrï¿½a (correa@lia.ufc.br)

Description copied from class: WorkspaceDriver
Creates and registers a link, with a specified name, between this location and the specified location, which will belong to this workspace at the return of this method.

Parameters:

locationName - the location joined to this one by the new link
